item.title: Commonly-used Building Options Explained
item.description: On Linux system, if we do not have root priviledge, we can not use package managers to install a package to its default location (usually under /usr). Besides, the packages installed by the package managers are often too old to have the latest features. Or, even if we have root priviledge, we do not want to mess up with the system-wide packages and just want to experiment with a package locally. On these ocassions, we may want to install the package to a custom location.

item.title: Building Tmux from Source on CentOS 7
item.description: Tmux is a great terminal multiplexer. The Tmux installed by yum is too old1 on my CentOS servers. So I decided to install the latest version of Tmux which supports true colors. item.title: Building Zsh from Source and Configuring It on CentOS
item.description:
Update: this is my first post on Zsh install and configuration. For a list of useful plugins I use to boost my productivity, see this post.

Zsh is a powerful shell with better auto-completion and richer functions. There are also various plugins to enrich your experience of using shell. In this post, I will introduce the installation and simple configurations for zsh.

item.title: Vim-like Settings for Tmux
item.description: I am a Neovim (or Nvim in abbreviation) user. In Nvim, we use Ctrl-W as prefix for window-related operations. However, the default prefix is Ctrl-B in Tmux. As a result, I often mistakenly press Ctrl-W when trying to change panes inside Tmux, which is annoying. Why not change tmux prefix to be more vim-like?

item.title: 为什么 `.bash_profile` 里面的设置没有生效？
item.description: 最近安装了 Neovim，并且在 HOME 目录下的 .bash_profile 中设置好了 Neovim 对应的 PATH 变量。奇怪的是，每次在 SSH 客户端新打开一个新的连接 session，登录服务器进入自己账号以后，位于 .bash_profile 中的 PATH 设置命令没有生效，导致我无法启动安装的 Neovim，每次登录以后，我还必须手动 source 一下 .bash_profile 文件，然后才能使用 nvim 命令，非常让人恼火。本文记录我排查问题的过程以及最终的解决方案。

item.title: How to Compile and Install Latest Version of GCC on CentOS 7
item.description: The default GCC that comes with the CentOS 7.2 is GCC 4.8.5, which does not support the complete C++11 standard, for example, it does not fully support regular expressions. In order to use regular expression functions, we need to install at least GCC 4.9.0. The following installation procedure is applicable to CentOS 7 and are not tested on other Linux systems. Also you have to make sure that you have root privelege.

item.title: CentOS 7 系统安装 Shadowsocks 并且开启多用户模式指南
item.description: 据说墙升级了，本来用得很流畅的服务也不行了，时不时断掉，让人很恼火。有必要升级一下梯子了，于是我也研究了一下利用 VPS 自建梯子的方法。本文总结一下安装中遇到的问题和解决办法，只针对 CentOS 7 系统，其他 Linux 系统配置方法是类似的。
